entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
